languages.text: Torpedoes and attack craft gain +60% {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against enemy attack craft attacks and +20% evasion against all other attacks.

traits.locale_text: Increases evasion of torpedoes and voidcrafts by 20% and allows 60% of evasion apply against void fighter's attacks

languages.text: 魚雷と攻撃機は、敵の攻撃機の攻撃に対して{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}+60%、それ以外の攻撃に対して回避+20%を得る。
